raw: * The radio group handles a collection of items from which only one item
* can be selected. Selection another item will deselect the previously selected
* item.
* This class is e.g. used to create radio groups or {@link qx.ui.form.RadioButton}
* or {@link qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton} instances.
* We also offer a widget for the same purpose which uses this class. So if
* you like to act with a widget instead of a pure logic coupling of the
* widgets, take a look at the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioButtonGroup} widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The radio group handles a collection of items from which only one item can be selected. Selection another item will deselect the previously selected item. This class is e.g. used to create radio groups or {@link qx.ui.form.RadioButton} or {@link qx.ui.toolbar.RadioButton} instances. We also offer a widget for the same purpose which uses this class. So if you like to act with a widget instead of a pure logic coupling of the widgets, take a look at the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioButtonGroup} widget.

raw: * The property name in each of the added widgets that is grouped

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The property name in each of the added widgets that is grouped

raw: * If is set to true the selection could be empty,

raw: * Returns whether the item is selectable. In opposite to the default
* implementation (which checks for visible items) every radio button
* which is part of the group is selected even if it is currently not visible.
* @param item {qx.ui.form.IRadioItem} The item to check if its selectable.
* @return {Boolean} true if the item is part of the radio group
* false otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the item is selectable. In opposite to the default implementation (which checks for visible items) every radio button which is part of the group is selected even if it is currently not visible.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.form.IRadioItem} The item to check if its selectable.
@param.description: The item to check if its selectable.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the item is part of the radio group false otherwise.
@return.description: true if the item is part of the radio group false otherwise.

raw: * Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no
* item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty.
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @return {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty. CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.
@return.description: An array of the models of the selected items.

raw: * Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding
* selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be
* selected.
* *Attention:* This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)!
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @param modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
*   selected.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be selected. Attention: This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)! CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
   selected.
@param.description:
An array of models, which should be
   selected.
